sentences.sContent: But the significance of the quarrel goes well beyond ethanol.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the significance of the quarrel goes well beyond ethanol.
sentences.sCn: 但是这场争论的意义远远不止于乙醇问题。

sentences.sContent: No cars in Brazil run on pure gasoline anymore. The government requires that all vehicles run on blended fuel of about one-quarter ethanol.
sentences.sContent_eng: No cars in Brazil run on pure gasoline anymore. The government requires that all vehicles run on blended fuel of about one-quarter ethanol.
sentences.sCn: 如今巴西不再使用单纯靠汽油驱动的汽车，政府要求所有机动车均采用含四分之一乙醇的混合燃料。

sentences.sContent: This includes construction of 15 ethanol plants with assistance from Brazil.
sentences.sContent_eng: This includes construction of 15 ethanol plants with assistance from Brazil.
sentences.sCn: 这包括在巴西的帮助下建设15个乙醇生产厂。

trans.tranCn: [有化] 乙醇，[有化] 酒精
trans.tranOther: the type of alcohol in alcoholic drinks, which can also be used as a fuel for cars
